name: NPR
text:
Trevor Milton is resigning from Nikola, a startup working on hydrogen-powered big rigs, after he was accused of fraudulently exaggerating the viability of some of his company's technology.
https://t.co/4vixnwgugb

name: NPR
text:
RT @KQEDarts: In this episode of #Rightnowish, stick 'til the very end to hear East Bay poet Victor Harris recite one of his favorite poems that speaks perfectly for our times right now. 

LISTEN ➡ https://t.co/7p5ZBPYH95 https://t.co/3m1c2Vh3Fn

name: NPR
text:
The pandemic has disrupted all kinds of supply chains — including the one that leads to the landfill.

Residential trash has increased. Some sanitation workers have gotten sick or had to quarantine. And it's not easy to find replacements.
https://t.co/kiUYPZBN4O

name: NPR
text:
RT @npratc: The coronavirus has killed nearly 200,000 people in America — far more than in any other country. It's not clear exactly how many of the dead are health care workers. Today on #NPRConsiderThis, how the pandemic is affecting the entire health care system.
https://t.co/gtqlADEnuO
